name: The Pretender (Interactive Music Video)
description:
A game based on the song 'The Pretender' by Foo Fighters

Survive till the end of the song.

CONTROLS:

WASD or Arrows: to move
Space: to boost
R: to restart
escape: to quit
ENTER: to start

*I do not own the music, all rights for the song are by Foo Fighters*
